resources.string: Register your device to share location with your group
All devices with the same Group ID can see each other\'s location.
No other devices in your group yet
Share your Group ID with others to add them to your group
Changes will take effect after saving
Display current weather instead of tracking status
Adjust tracking frequency based on transportation mode
Use Google Activity Recognition to detect walking, cycling, driving
Detect when connected to car Bluetooth
Detect when Android Auto is active
%1$d%% of normal interval when in vehicle
%1$d%% of normal interval when not in vehicle
To detect when you\'re in a vehicle, Phone Manager needs access to activity recognition (to detect driving) and Bluetooth (to detect car connections).
Create an alert to get notified when a group member is nearby
Select a group member to monitor
No group members available. Make sure you\'re registered to a group.
How close should they be to trigger the alert?
Create a geofence to get notified when entering or leaving specific locations
Give your geofence a memorable name
Enter the center coordinates of your geofence
Please enter valid coordinates (lat: -90 to 90, lng: -180 to 180)
How large should the geofence area be?
Link a webhook to send events to external services
Create a webhook to send geofence events to external services like Home Assistant or n8n.
Save this secret! You\'ll need it to verify webhook signatures.
When a geofence event occurs, the server sends an HTTP POST request to your URL with event details in JSON format. The payload is signed with HMAC-SHA256 using your secret.
Your privacy: Location data is stored on your device and only sent to your group members. We do not track or store your location on our servers.
No location history for this period
Try selecting a different date range
Notify when they come within range
Notify when they leave the range
Notify on both entering and exiting
Trigger after staying in the area
Location tracking is active. Toggle to stop.
Location tracking is inactive. Toggle to start.
Phone Manager needs access to your location to track your device\'s position.
To continue tracking your location when the app is closed or in the background, please allow location access \"All the time\" on the next screen.
This helps you know when tracking is running and provides quick access to stop it.
How your device appears to others
Share this ID with others to form a group
Devices with the same Group ID can see each other
How often to refresh group member locations on the map
Your trips will appear here once movement is detected
This trip will be permanently deleted. This action cannot be undone.
Select a start and end date to filter trips
Combine trips separated by short stops
Events will appear here when movement is detected
This will delete all events older than 7 days. This action cannot be undone.
The \"%1$s\" setting is managed by your group administrator and cannot be changed locally.
This setting is managed by your group administrator.
Contact your group administrator if you need this setting changed.
Notifications about device settings changes from your group administrator
%1$s has updated your device settings for group %2$s
%1$s is now available for you to change
Your request to unlock \"%1$s\" was approved by %2$s
Your request to unlock \"%1$s\" was denied by %2$s
Your request to unlock \"%1$s\" was denied by %2$s: %3$s
This will remove your device from %1$s and clear all enterprise policies.
You may need to re-enroll to access company resources.
Link this device to your account to:
View it in your device list
Primary device is used for notifications
This device\'s location will be visible to you from your other devices.
Link this device to your account to manage it from anywhere.
Warning: Unlinking this device will sign you out and remove it from your account.
Are you sure you want to unlink \"%1$s\" from your account?
Warning: This will sign you out of this device.
Transfer \"%1$s\" to another user. You will lose ownership of this device.
Please enter a valid user ID
The new owner must have an account. You can find their user ID in their profile.
Create a group to share device locations with family and friends.
Create a group to share device locations with family and friends.
Group name must be 50 characters or less
Please sign in to join the group
Enter the 8-character code you received or scan a QR code
Sign in to join this group
You\'re about to join this group with %1$d members.
As a member, you\'ll be able to share your location with other group members.
Warning: Deleting this group will remove all members and cannot be undone.
Please enter a valid email address
Failed to send reset email. Please try again.
We\'ve sent a password reset link to:
Please check your email and follow the instructions to reset your password.
Enter your email address and we\'ll send you a link to reset your password.
I agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
Are you sure you want to sign out?
Are you sure you want to delete \"%1$s\"? This action cannot be undone.
Create a template to quickly apply settings to devices
Other group admins can use this template
Are you sure you want to lock this setting? The user will not be able to change it.
Are you sure you want to unlock this setting? The user will be able to change it.
This will permanently delete the group and remove all members.
You will no longer have access to this group\'s location data.
Are you sure you want to remove this member from the group?
You will become a regular member of this group.
Are you sure you want to delete \"%1$s\"?
Are you sure you want to leave \"%1$s\"?
Group name must be 50 characters or less
Can manage members and group settings
Are you sure you want to remove \"%1$s\" from the group?
They will lose access to shared device locations and will need to be re-invited to rejoin.
Are you sure you want to transfer ownership of this group to \"%1$s\"?
You will become an admin and they will become the owner. Only they will be able to delete the group.
Create an invite to add new members
Anyone with this code will no longer be able to join the group.
Are you sure you want to revoke this invite?
Invite people to join this group.
Enter the enrollment code provided by your IT administrator, or scan the QR code from your enrollment email.
Contact your IT administrator if you don\'t have an enrollment code.
Point the camera at the QR code from your IT administrator
How will you use this device?
Choose how you\'d like to set up your device
Set up for personal location tracking. You control all settings and data.
Enroll with your company. Settings may be managed by your IT administrator.
You can change your setup later in Settings
Your device has been successfully enrolled
You can view enrollment details and contact IT support in Settings
Are you sure you want to unlink \"%1$s\"?
Warning: This will sign you out of this device.
Please enter a valid user ID
Warning: Unlinking this device will sign you out and remove it from your account.
Transfer \"%1$s\" to another user. You will lose ownership of this device.
The new owner must have an account. You can find their user ID in their profile.
We need camera access to scan enrollment QR codes. You can also enter the enrollment code manually.
We need camera access to scan QR codes. You can also enter the invite code manually.
The code will be scanned automatically
Why do you need to change this setting?
Please provide a reason for this request. The admin will review your request and respond.
Unlock requests you create will appear here
Sign in to access advanced features
